topic.title: The function of the foreign element
topic.shortdesc: Before the Version of the DITA-OT1.4.1, If you wanna define the new element doesn't belong to the DITA-OT , It may lead to errors or warnings when you compile the dita file, but in the later DITA-OT version, we fix this bug , so we can define the element as what we want between the foreign or unknown element.

ul.li: this is important for lots of reasons.
this is not important to me.
